meanings.definition: A musical instrument with strings, similar to a lyre.
meanings.sent1: The musician played beautiful melodies on the citharas.
meanings.sent2: At the concert, the band included citharas in their performance.
meanings.sent3: The citharas and drums had a musical conversation on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the citharas like a gentle breeze through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the citharas echoed through the ancient hall, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, there were many ancient citharas on display.
meanings.sent2: The musicians carried their citharas in beautifully crafted cases.
meanings.sent3: The citharas lined up in rows, looking like a forest of musical instruments.
meanings.sent4: The citharas stood out among the other instruments, like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the harmonious sounds of the citharas, creating a magical atmosphere.
